title: Kick back and relax! You've just found a great 2 bed, 1 bath!
map_address: 6097 Memorial Dr near South Hairston Road
posting_body: ['RENTAL INFO', 'Rental Rates:', '$1673/month', 'Location:', '6097 Memorial Dr Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'Unit for Rent:', '2-BR 1-BA |', 'Square Feet:', '972 sq ft |', 'Lease Length:', '6-Month, 12-Month', 'No specials at this time.', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES', '− Business Center', '− Fitness Center', '− Freeway Access', '− Gated', '− Onsite Maintenance', '− Onsite Management', '− Playground', '− Pool', '− Public Transportation', '− Shopping Nearby', '− 2 Miles from Stone Mountain Park', '− Controlled Access Entry Gates', '− Georgia Perimeter College Minutes Away', '− Marta Bus Stop at Community Entry', '− Professionally Landscaped', '− Sparkling Pool with Fountains', '− Walking Distance to Shopping and Dining', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', '− Air Conditioning', '− Cable Ready', '− Carpet', '− Dishwasher', '− Garbage Disposal', '− Handicap Accessible', '− Heating', '− High Speed Internet Access', '− Patio or Balcony', '− Range', '− Alarm Systems in Select Apartments', '− All Appliances are Electric', '− Walk-in Closets in Select Apartments', '− Washers and Dryers Provided in Most Apartments', '− Water Based on Usage', '− White on White Kitchens', 'ADDITIONAL INFO', 'Description:', 'Welcome to Wildwood at Stone Mountain Apartment Homes, a hidden treasure in the shadow of Stone Mountain.', 'Relax on your private patio or balcony.', 'Enjoy an array of amenities including a sparkling pool, fitness gym and Resident Business Center, all in the natural setting only 2 miles from Stone Mountain Park.', 'What a smart move!', 'Pet Policy:', 'Breed Restriction;Weight Restriction;Pet friendly.', 'No pets over 10 pounds and no aggressive breeds.', ' $300 pet fee, $500 for two pets and $35 per pet each month.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Wildwood At Stone Mountain:', 'show contact info', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '48CDE2F219E7450']
